ai-tha-ap148:1.1_0: “I saw a lion, a holy man,
ai-tha-ap148:1.4_0: she did a legal procedure of living creatures.
ai-tha-ap148:2.3_0: the Teacher, while standing in the Saṅgha,
ai-tha-ap148:3.1_0: ‘This one is very striken by the white cloth,
ai-tha-ap148:3.4_0: you’ll make an end to suffering.’
ai-tha-ap148:4.4_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap148:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Protector.
ai-tha-ap148:8.1_0: attaining the sixth (which) the Elder Nun Protector of the World
